# Butte School District Driver Education

Registration for the 2022 Drivers Education Program will open on March 30th at
8 am and close on April 13th at 12pm.  The link for online registration will
be emailed to all 8th-12th grade parents within the district and the
registration link will also be available here on the school district website.
